title: Power Modulo Inverted
text:
Given 3 positive integersx,yandz, you can findk = xy% zeasily, by fast power-modulo algorithm. Now your task is the inverse of this algorithm. Given 3 positive integersx,zandk, find the smallest non-negative integery, such thatk % z = xy%z.InputAbout 600 test cases.Each test case contains one line with 3 integersx,zandk.(1 ≤x,z,k≤ 109)Input terminates by three zeroes.OutputFor each test case, output one line with the answer, or "No Solution"(without quotes) if such an integer doesn't exist.ExampleInput:5 58 33
2 4 3
0 0 0Output:9
No Solution
